content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine for automation science packs at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough copper plates and iron gear wheels in your inventory before attempting to craft automation science packs. 

### Errors when furnace is not operational
- Check the furnace's status and ensure it has the necessary ingredients to operate. If it shows "no ingredients to smelt," make sure to supply it with the required materials.

### Errors when using electricity
- Ensure that all electrical entities, such as the assembling machine and steam engine, are connected to a power network. If they are not receiving electricity, check your power connections and adjust accordingly.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
